description:
Situated in the heart of Ballina this "mid century modern" style home is brilliantly set on a corner block. Caravan and boat storage is a breeze with the dual street frontage, and dual driveway access points already in place, and home business owners could also be well catered for here in this central location.

For those seeking a family home with character and flair the retro vibe will capture the heart strings. The beautiful timber floors and funky original kitchen and bathroom are all in good condition, and each of the three bedrooms are carpeted and include built-in wardrobes.

The easy flow of the living, dining and kitchen areas leads you out to discover the fully fenced and private rear yard. This is where the fun really kicks up another level... with a built-in bar in the all-weather alfresco area setting the scene for fantastic year 'round entertaining!

Cars, caravans, trailers, boats are all easily accommodated, and the extra long tandem garage includes a very handy separate workshop/storage area plus potential wine cellar.

Located close to the river it's an easy stroll down the street to drop in a line, or watch the pelicans float by. Active and sporty types are well catered for with nearby sporting facilities, and the convenient location means you have access to all the amenities that Ballina has to offer.

Live in and enjoy as is, or one day you might even want to capitalise on the medium density zoning and the opportunity to build an attached duplex (STCA).

Secure your own slice of the beach lifestyle in this coastal town and arrange your inspection of this feel-good property today by contacting Robyn Hunt on 0448 448 758.

*** Disclaimer: Whilst every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these particulars, no warranty is given by the vendor or the agent as to their accuracy. Interested parties should not rely on these particulars as representations of fact but must instead satisfy themselves by inspection or otherwise.
